[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Why_is_thats mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1512478761 Uploaded to Steam by CrunchyDuck from the GitHub-repository https://github.com/AaronCRobinson/ExpandedRoofing Later updated to 1.1 and 1.2 by me Then continued by KiameV for 1.3: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2568893936 Then NigrumMortis to 1.4: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2879451927
- Added a power-bar to the solar roof controller to visualize current power as well as show if there are need for more controllers.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds customizable roofing, with transparent greenhouse roofing and photovoltaic solar roofing. Reworked from Vendan's original idea. A direct port of the [url=https://github.com/AaronCRobinson/ExpandedRoofing]Github version made by [b]AaronCRobinson.[/b][/url] I take no credit for anything made in this mod. [b]Works on 0.19.0 as well as 1.0.0.[/b]
[h1]Features[/h1] - Transparent roofs that let almost all light through - Solar roofs and controllers that can be used to generate power - Removal of thick roofs - Thick roofs (which require maintenance as of Late A17/B18) - 4 new techs to research for each of these features. - Disables settings when `Don't Tempt Me!` is enabled (Vassteel Rydex's request)
[h1]Solar Roofing and Controllers explained[/h1] - Each controller has a max output of 2500w - Each solar tile produces 200w during full sun - There is no limit to the number of controllers connected to a section of tiles
[h1]Roof Maintenance[/h1] - Maintenance required for thick roofs (only) - Maintenance is a long tick (once every 2000 ticks) - Maintenance is required after 5000 ticks (~167 days) - After 7500 ticks collapses can occur by MTB event. (~250 days) - MTB event is set for 3.5 days. - These numbers are subject to change.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] - Is compatible with any existing B19 save with no other roofing mods - It's recommended to have this mod load early in your mod load order
[h1]Notes[/h1] - New designators are in the `Zone` tab - Due to how roofs are implement, it's easiest to rezone default roofing to new types
[h1]Translations[/h1] - English - Turkish (by Slevilex) - Russian (by Garr Incorporated, updated by lex1975) - French (by Jozay) - Chinese (by Rosenmund and 不为人知的汉子) - Japanese (by mundane_m)
